author: BBC Sport
description: Maria Sharapova signs a deal with the Lawn Tennis Association to play at Birmingham's Aegon Classic for the next two years.
title: Maria Sharapova signs two-year Birmingham deal

author: BBC Sport
description: Maria Sharapova earns a Wimbledon qualifying place - at least - with a first-round win over Christina McHale in Rome.
title: Italian Open: Maria Sharapova win secures Wimbledon qualifying place

author: BBC Sport
description: The basis for the decision not to give Maria Sharapova a French Open wildcard is wrong, says the chief executive of the WTA.
title: Maria Sharapova: French Open wildcard reasoning wrong, say WTA

description: Maria Sharapova will not be able to play this year's French Open this year — not even in the qualifying rounds.
title: No French Open wild card for Maria Sharapova after doping ban

author: BBC Sport
description: Former champion Maria Sharapova will not play at the French Open as tournament officials decide against giving her a wildcard.
title: Maria Sharapova: French Open decides against giving former champion a wildcard

description: PARIS (AP) — Two-time champion Maria Sharapova has missed out on a wild-card entry for the French Open because of her doping ban. Announcing the decision on a live Facebook broadcast on Tuesday, French Tennis Federation president Bernard Giudicelli said he told Sharapova in person that it was not possible. "I decided not to give Maria Sharapova a wild card. I'm very sorry for Maria, very sorry for her fans. They might be disappointed, she might be very disappointed," Giudicelli said. "But it's my responsibility, it's my mission to protect the game and protect the high standards of the game."
title: Sharapova misses out on French Open wild card after doping

author: Reuters Editorial
description: Maria Sharapova's hopes of a dream return from doping outcast to a third French Open crown were shattered on Tuesday when the Russian was surprisingly refused a wildcard by organizers.
title: No French Open wildcard for snubbed Sharapova
